entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers. Showers beginning before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 21 with temperature falling to 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon.
